name: poc_virtualmachine_size
label: POC - Virtual machine size
description: CPU, memory and storage sizing for virtual machines

attributes.name: vm_memory
attributes.description: Memory assigned to the virtual machine in megabytes. This value is required to be an increment of 1024
attributes.label: Virtual Machine Memory

attributes.name: vm_vcpu
attributes.description: Number of virtual CPU for the virtual machine, which is required to be a positive Integer
attributes.label: Virtual Machine vCPUs

attributes.name: vm_root_disk_datastore
attributes.description: Data store or storage cluster name for target virtual machine's disks
attributes.label: Datastore

attributes.name: vm_root_disk_size
attributes.description: Size of template disk volume. Should be equal to template's disk size
attributes.label: Root Disk Size
